name: One Man Faction
description:
You play a CypherDummy trying to stop the spread of zombie like tehcno virus that's putting the dummy back in CrashDummy. Factions at War? This hardcore SOB is a solo faction at war with everyone!

My initial idea was to create a game that would let me learn the basics of Unreal but have scope to build on after the game jam. I liked the idea of an arcade, high score shooter game - I figured people can get competive with each other and it would reduce the need for too many fancy mechanics (big guns, mean enemies and powerups. Job done).

I knew instantly that I wanted an open world that would start teeny tiny and and then expand over time. The bigger the world becomes the longer the time players can spend it in.

I've worked into a github repo to track progress and share some video of the game.

https://github.com/itdrewitself/Collider-Game-Jam-TD
